title: Blue 2 Red, Ja Rule is Back! 12.17.19
itunes:title: Blue 2 Red, Ja Rule is Back! 12.17.19
description:
In episode 537, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Blake Wexler to discuss Aunt Becky doubling down on her not guilty plea, a call on Democrats to mobilize, Fox and Friends being confused that people want Trump impeached, Democratic polls for the 2020 election, Ja Rule's new Fyre Festival song, Nick Cannon's diss track, the villain of Black Christmas, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Lori Loughlin accuses prosecutors of concealing evidence in college admissions scandal
  2. Booker calls for Democrats to mobilize against Van Drew after party switch
  3. Fox Host’s Brain Explodes Over Fox Poll Showing 50% Of Voters Want Trump Removed
  4. "Fox & Friends" co-host Brian Kilmeade is "stunned" by Fox's poll showing that 50% of voters want Trump impeached and removed from office.
  5. Biden, Sanders lead Democratic field: poll
  6. Ja Rule addresses Fyre Festival fiasco on new track ‘FYRE’
  7. NICK CANNON TIL EM RESPONDS, I'M GONNA RUN IT BACK ... Diss Track On Repeat!!!
  8. Weekend Box Office
  9. With ‘Black Christmas,’ Sophia Takal Makes a #MeToo Slasher
  10. ‘Black Christmas’ Was the First ‘Halloween’
  11. The ‘Black Christmas’ Remake Subverts a Complex Horror Trope
  12. See DAILY ZEITGEIST AT SF Sketchfest - tickets here!
  13. WATCH: Andrew Ashong - flowers

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
